hero.title: ADORABLE KITTENS
hero.subtitle: Your Perfect Companion is Here!
hero.description: Welcome to SnowBrisco! We raise Scottish Fold, Scottish Straight, and British Shorthair babies with tons of love!

about.title: Our Amazing Journey!
about.subtitle: Hey there, fellow cat lover! Since 2021, we've been living our dream - raising the most adorable, cuddly, and loving kitties you'll ever meet! Every day is filled with purrs, play time, and pure happiness!
about.paragraph1: Picture this: We fell head-over-heels in love with cats and thought, "Why not share this incredible joy with the world?" That's how SnowBrisco was born - from pure love and a dream to connect amazing kitties with their perfect families!
about.paragraph2: We're totally obsessed with three incredible breeds - Scottish Fold (those adorable folded ears!), Scottish Straight (elegant and playful!), and British Shorthair (chunky and lovable!) - each one bringing their own special magic to our hearts and homes.
about.paragraph3: Every single one of our fur babies grows up surrounded by love, cuddles, belly rubs, and all the attention they deserve! They're not just cats to us - they're family members getting ready to make YOUR family complete!

specialFeatures.breedWithHearts: We breed with our hearts - every kitty gets tons of love and socialization!
specialFeatures.topNotchHealthCare: Top-notch health care and genetic testing - because healthy = happy!
specialFeatures.playTime: Play time, cuddle time, and socialization from day one!
specialFeatures.foreverSupport: We're here for you and your furry friend - forever and always!

catGallery.title: Find Your Perfect Companion!
catGallery.subtitle: Ready to adopt or purchase your new family member? Meet our beautiful cats looking for their forever homes. Each kitty is health tested, vaccinated, and raised with endless love!
catGallery.interestedText: Interested in one of our cats? Contact us to learn more or schedule a visit.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to welcome a new furry family member? We'd love to hear from you! Contact us to learn more about our available cats or schedule a visit.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about yourself, your living situation, and any questions you have...
contact.stayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest cats, news, and adorable moments!
contact.hereToAnswer: We're here to answer all your questions!

footer.companyDescription: Since 2021, we've been the proud cat parents behind SnowBrisco, where every kitty is raised with endless cuddles and love! Our Scottish Fold, Scottish Straight, and British Shorthair babies can't wait to meet their forever families and bring joy to your world!
footer.copyright: Creating magical moments, one paw at a time
